languages.text: "Кроме того, прежде Ваша Светлость не уделяла внимания возможностям, которые открывает сотрудничество с Миссией Касбаллики. Сейчас для вас идеальный момент, чтобы обрести нового союзника. Во времена кризисов любые друзья ценны".

"Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."
languages.original_text: "Кроме того, прежде Ваша Светлость не уделяла внимания возможностям, которые открывает сотрудничество с Миссией Касбаллики. Сейчас для вас идеальный момент, чтобы обрести нового союзника. Во времена кризисов любые друзья ценны".

traits.locale_text: "Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

"Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

"Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

languages.text: “而且，大人您还没有考虑过于卡斯巴利卡集团此外合作的可能性。如今正是您结交盟友的大好时机。在这危机时刻，每一份友谊都弥足珍贵。”
languages.original_text: "Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

traits.locale_text: “而且，大人您还没有考虑过于卡斯巴利卡集团此外合作的可能性。如今正是您结交盟友的大好时机。在这危机时刻，每一份友谊都弥足珍贵。”

languages.text: 「それに、陛下はカスバリカ聖務団で働くことでどんな可能性が開けるのかには気が付いておられない。今こそ新しい味方を見つけるチャンスですよ。困った時は、どんな友情であっても価値があるというものです」
languages.original_text: "Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、陛下はカスバリカ聖務団で働くことでどんな可能性が開けるのかには気が付いておられない。今こそ新しい味方を見つけるチャンスですよ。困った時は、どんな友情であっても価値があるというものです」

languages.text: «Además, mi{mf|lord|lady} aún no ha considerado las posibilidades que brinda trabajar con la misión Kasballica. Ahora es el momento perfecto para ganar un nuevo aliado. En tiempos de crisis, toda amistad es valiosa».
languages.original_text: "Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

traits.locale_text: «Además, mi{mf|lord|lady} aún no ha considerado las posibilidades que brinda trabajar con la misión Kasballica. Ahora es el momento perfecto para ganar un nuevo aliado. En tiempos de crisis, toda amistad es valiosa».

languages.text: "Außerdem hat Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft noch nicht in Erwägung gezogen, welche Möglichkeiten sich durch die Kasballica-Mission eröffnen. Das ist für Euch der perfekte Zeitpunkt, um einen neuen Verbündeten zu gewinnen. In Krisenzeiten ist jede Freundschaft wertvoll."
languages.original_text: "Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem hat Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft noch nicht in Erwägung gezogen, welche Möglichkeiten sich durch die Kasballica-Mission eröffnen. Das ist für Euch der perfekte Zeitpunkt, um einen neuen Verbündeten zu gewinnen. In Krisenzeiten ist jede Freundschaft wertvoll."

languages.text: « Par ailleurs, vous n'avez manifestement pas encore réfléchi aux opportunités que vous offrirait votre collaboration avec la Mission de la Kasballica. C'est le moment idéal de vous faire un nouvel allié. En temps de crise, chaque ami est précieux. »
languages.original_text: "Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

traits.locale_text: « Par ailleurs, vous n'avez manifestement pas encore réfléchi aux opportunités que vous offrirait votre collaboration avec la Mission de la Kasballica. C'est le moment idéal de vous faire un nouvel allié. En temps de crise, chaque ami est précieux. »

languages.text: "Üstelik zatıaliniz, Kasballica Misyonu'yla iş birliği yapmanın önünü açacağı imkânları da henüz gözden geçirmiş değilsiniz. Yeni bir müttefik edinmeniz için harikulade bir vakit bu. Böylesi zor zamanlarda her dostluğun değeri vardır."
languages.original_text: "Besides, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has not yet considered the possibilities that working with the Kasballica Mission opens up. Now is the perfect moment for you to gain a new ally. In a time of crisis, every friendship is valuable."

traits.locale_text: "Üstelik zatıaliniz, Kasballica Misyonu'yla işbirliği yapmanın önünü açacağı imkânları da henüz gözden geçirmiş değilsiniz. Yeni bir müttefik edinmeniz için harikulade bir vakit bu. Böylesi zor zamanlarda her dostluğun değeri vardır."
